biotools.summary: Lightweight detection of sequences in raw MinION data. BaseLess reduces your MinION sequencing device to a simple species detector. As a trade-off, it runs on inexpensive computational hardware like single-board computers. The neural network it uses is a composite of many smaller networks, each detecting a different k-mer, thus reconfiguration of baseLess to detect a different sequence amounts to combining different smaller networks.
